input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration entry defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_AR_System

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The work order concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

output.description: String Value - Count of successful work orders
String Value - Count of work orders that failed creation.
An XML document that contains detail for one or more successful work orders.
An XML document containing failed work orders.

An XML document - consolidated success status from each output.
Sample: <work-orders> <work-order> <success-status>success</success-status> <work-order-id>WO0000000000233</work-order-id> </work-order> <work-order> <success-status>success</success-status> <work-order-id>WO0000000000234</work-order-id> </work-order> <work-order> <success-status>success</success-status> <work-order-id>WO0000000000235</work-order-id> </work-order> </work-orders>

An XML document - consolidated status message from each output.
Sample: <work-orders> <work-order> <status-message>Association created successfully</status-message> <work-order-id>WO0000000000233</work-order-id> </work-order> <work-order> <status-message>Association created successfully</status-message> <work-order-id>WO0000000000234</work-order-id> </work-order> <work-order> <status-message>Association created successfully</status-message> <work-order-id>WO0000000000235</work-order-id> </work-order> </work-orders>

call-process.process-name: :AutoPilot-OA-Work_Order_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values for Single Work Order

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Unknown system "${system}"</xsl:text> </status-message> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <success-status>${success status}</success-status> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <success-status>${success status}</success-status> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <success-status>${success status}</success-status> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-order> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> <work-order-id> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </work-order-id> </work-order> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-orders> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${failed work order} </work-orders> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <work-orders> <xsl:copy-of select="node()/*" /> ${work order} </work-orders> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will associate Change\Incident\CI\Work Order to a work order
